creator: thomas.minor@materna.de
text:
It seems like the archive httpd-2.0.47.tar.gz is broken on the download 
servers. I tried 3 of them, on all of them the archive was broken.
httpd-2.0.47.tar.Z seems to be ok.

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
There is no problem with the file.

More than likely, your browser is changing the filename on you
when it is downloaded.  Try saving it to disk and repairing the
filename to end in .tar.gz.
